disc: Anti-Glomerular Basement Membrane antibody disease (Goodpasture's syndrome and Goodpasture's disease) is an autoimmune small vessel vasculitis involving the capillaries of the kidney and lung. Clinical features include rapid progressing crescentic glomerulonephritis and pulmonary haemorrhages.
